title: Environmental management
context: [ยง339D-26] Environmental management. (a) All covered televisions recovered pursuant to this part shall be recycled in a manner that complies with all applicable federal, state, and county laws and requirements. (b) The department shall adopt by reference the Institute of Scrap Recycling Industries, Inc.&rsquo;s Electronics Recycling Operating Practices as requirements. [L 2009, c 183, pt of ยง6]
